XAxiPcie_BarAddr Struct Reference

#include <xaxipcie.h>

List of all members.

Public Attributes

u32 LowerAddr
u32 UpperAddr

Detailed Description

The user is required to use this strucuture when reading or writing translation vector between local bus BARs and AXI PCIe BARs. It is used when calling "XAxiPcie_GetLocalBusBar2PcieBar" and "XAxiPcie_SetLocalBusBar2PcieBar" functions. The translation vectors are 64 bits wide even though they might only use the lower 32 bits

Member Data Documentation

u32 XAxiPcie_BarAddr::LowerAddr

Lower 32 bits of translation value

u32 XAxiPcie_BarAddr::UpperAddr

Upper 32 bits of translation value
